data.title: The Rise of Polri
data.meta_description: The Rise of Polri - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This thesis examines the rise of the Indonesian National Police (Polri) following the democratization of Indonesia in the late 1990s and early 2000s. It argues that while democratization moved Indonesia from authoritarian military rule to civilian democratic authority, it also facilitated the rise of Polri as a new perverse political actor within the state. The thesis demonstrates how Polri has become intimately involved in illicit practices and criminal economies, including accepting bribes from Chinese business networks and profiting from illegal gambling. Rather than improving governance, democratization has caused a restructuring of security forces' involvement in illicit financing, configuring new corrupt relationships between the state and criminal activities.
